pr_title: Fix displaying recordings over an hour

timeline.message: Fix lengths over an hour in audio controller
Move time formatting logic to its own class

timeline.bodyText: What happens if you just do HH:mm:ss here? Does it fail beyond 24 hours? Does that matter?
timeline.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: Yeah beyond 24 hours we roll back over. It's probably not a huge problem as I don't imagine people are recording/choosing audio that long but using DateTime is a little weird.
replies.author: seadowg

replies.bodyText: Oh, I see. It also always puts the hours which is not what we want for clips under an hour.
replies.author: lognaturel
